list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: 5 October, 2018 Added a view DEMOCLASS_TAKENDAYS to get the days where classes were taken Added a method getTakenOnDayList to find out all the days where classes were taken Added a method wasTakenOnDay to find out if class was taken on a specific day Added a boolHandler method

task.summary: Initial Commit Built database connecting class

MESSAGE.value: Initial Commit Built database connecting class

30 September, 2018 Modified SQL views so that all tables are sorted according to SID ascending. Added a method at XEBase for searching days of attendance according to SID. Added a method for extended attendance list containing SID, name, contact number, address, attendance count and attendance percentage.

5 October, 2018 Added a view DEMOCLASS_TAKENDAYS to get the days where classes were taken Added a method getTakenOnDayList to find out all the days where classes were taken Added a method wasTakenOnDay to find out if class was taken on a specific day Added a boolHandler method

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: 5 October, 2018 Added a view DEMOCLASS_TAKENDAYS to get the days where classes were taken Added a method getTakenOnDayList to find out all the days where classes were taken Added a method wasTakenOnDay to find out if class was taken on a specific day Added a boolHandler method
